feed.title: Heavy Hitters
feed.subtitle: Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean will be discussing the likes of NFL and college football, baseball, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!

entry.title: NFL Week 16 and CFB Playoff Round 1 Picks - Season 3 Episode 54

link.title: NFL Week 16 and CFB Playoff Round 1 Picks - Season 3 Episode 54

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for this weekend’s games in the NFL for week 16 of the 2024-25 season along with his picks for each game in the first round of the 12 team college football playoff bracket.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
entry.summary: This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for this weekend’s games in the NFL for week 16 of the 2024-25 season along with his picks for each game in the first round of the 12 team college football playoff bracket.

entry.title: CFB Playoff Rankings Review, NFL Week 14 Takeaways, and Juan Soto to the Mets Reaction (ft. Keenan Womack) - Season 3 Episode 53

link.title: CFB Playoff Rankings Review, NFL Week 14 Takeaways, and Juan Soto to the Mets Reaction (ft. Keenan Womack) - Season 3 Episode 53

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean Gutic along with special guest Keenan Womack of SI Mavericks review the newly revealed college football playoff rankings along with the 12 team playoff bracket as well as their predictions. After that, Dean and Keenan give us both of their takeaways from the NFL season so far after the week 14 games that took place on Sunday. To close out the episode, Dean and Keenan give us their reactions to the big news regarding star outfielder Juan Soto after he chose to sign a 15 year $765 million deal with the New York Mets on Sunday night.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: WWE Survivor Series: WarGames, CFB Week 12 and NFL Week 13 Predictions - Season 3 Episode 52

link.title: WWE Survivor Series: WarGames, CFB Week 12 and NFL Week 13 Predictions - Season 3 Episode 52

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean Gutic and Jack Acello give us their picks for this week’s games in college football for rivalry week along with their picks for the games in the NFL for Thanksgiving week. After that, Dean and Jack close out the show by sharing some news in wrestling along with giving us a recap of Monday night raw and their predictions for the matches taking place at WWE Survivor Series: WarGames this Saturday.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

entry.title: NFL Week 12 Picks and NHL Monthly Takeaways - Season 3 Episode 51

link.title: NFL Week 12 Picks and NHL Monthly Takeaways - Season 3 Episode 51

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean and special guest Charley Novack give us their picks for this week’s games in the NFL along with their reactions to the firings of GM Joe Douglas of the New York Jets and head coach Jim Montgomery of the Boston Bruins. After that, Dean and Charley give us their takeaways from the first month of the NHL 2024-25 season.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

entry.title: CFB Week 12 and NFL Week 11 Picks, and UFC 309 Predictions - Season 3 Episode 50

link.title: CFB Week 12 and NFL Week 11 Picks, and UFC 309 Predictions - Season 3 Episode 50

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his picks for this week’s games and both college football and the NFL along with an update of the college football playoff top 25 rankings. To close out the episode, Dean gives us his predictions for the big fights taking place this Saturday at Madison Square Garden in New York City for UFC 309.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: CFB Week 11 and NFL Week 10 Picks, NFL Trade Deadline Day Recap, and CFB Playoff Rankings Review - Season 3 Episode 49

link.title: CFB Week 11 and NFL Week 10 Picks, NFL Trade Deadline Day Recap, and CFB Playoff Rankings Review - Season 3 Episode 49

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for this week’s games in both college football and the NFL. Along with that, Dean gives us a recap of what happened from deadline day for the NFL this past Tuesday as well as a rundown of the first ever CFB playoff rankings for this year.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: MLB World Series Update and CFB Week 10 and NFL Week 9 Picks - Season 3 Episode 48

link.title: MLB World Series Update and CFB Week 10 and NFL Week 9 Picks - Season 3 Episode 48

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his picks for this week’s games in both college football and the NFL along with providing an update with what’s going on in the 2024 World Series matchup between the New York Yankees and Los Angeles Dodgers along with his takeaways from the series so far. [Recorded before Game 5]

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: DeAndre Hopkins to the Chiefs Reaction, CFB Week 9, NFL Week 8, UFC 308 and MLB World Series Predictions - Season 3 Episode 47

link.title: DeAndre Hopkins to the Chiefs Reaction, CFB Week 9, NFL Week 8, UFC 308 and MLB World Series Predictions - Season 3 Episode 47

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his reaction to Tennessee Titans star WR DeAndre Hopkins getting traded to the Kansas City Chiefs. After that, Dean gives us his picks for this week’s games in both college football and the NFL. Finally, Dean closes out the episode by also giving his predictions for the MLB World Series this year along with the main fights this Saturday at UFC 308.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

entry.title: CFB Week 8 and NFL Week 7 Picks, MLB ALCS and NLCS Updates, Davante Adams and Amari Cooper Trade Reactions - Season 3 Episode 46

link.title: CFB Week 8 and NFL Week 7 Picks, MLB ALCS and NLCS Updates, Davante Adams and Amari Cooper Trade Reactions - Season 3 Episode 46

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean starts off the episode by giving us an update based on what’s happening in the MLB with the postseason being in the ALCS and NLCS stage. After that, Dean gives us his reaction to Las Vegas Raiders star WR Davante Adams getting traded to the New York Jets and Cleveland Browns star WR Amari Cooper getting traded to the Buffalo Bills and what it means for both teams after acquiring the two biggest names on the market prior to the trade deadline. Finally, Dean closes out the episode by giving us his pics for this week’s games and both college football and the NFL.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: CFB Week 7 and NFL Week 6 Picks, MLB Postseason Review, and NHL 2024-25 Season Predictions - Season 3 Episode 45

link.title: CFB Week 7 and NFL Week 6 Picks, MLB Postseason Review, and NHL 2024-25 Season Predictions - Season 3 Episode 45

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his picks for the games this weekend in both college football and the NFL. Along with that, Dean gives us a review and an update with what’s been going on in the MLB postseason. Finally, Dean gives us his predictions for the upcoming 2024-25 NHL season.
